schemaVersion: 2.2.0
metadata:
  name: mydevfile
projects:
  - name: my-go-project
    clonePath: go/src/github.com/acme/my-go-project
    git:
      remotes:
        origin: 'https://github.com/acme/my-go-project.git'
components:
  - name: go-cli
    container:
      image: golang
      memoryLimit: 512Mi
      mountSources: true
      command: ['sleep', 'infinity']
      env:
        - name: GOPATH
          value: $(PROJECTS_ROOT)/go
        - name: GOCACHE
          value: /tmp/go-cache
commands:
  - id: compile and run
    exec:
      component: go-cli
      commandLine: 'go get -d && go run main.go'
      workingDir: '${PROJECTS_ROOT}/src/github.com/acme/my-go-project'
